DOC.brief_summary: Other studies suggest that low Vitamin D levels may contribute to musculoskeletal pain. Hypothesis: Administration of oral Vitamin D supplements will improve vague musculoskeletal pain in children.
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Versus Placebo in the Treatment of Vague Musculoskeletal Pain in Children
DOC.criteria: ages 514 healthy vague musculoskeletal pain without diagnosis medications (steroids, seizure medications, birth control pills or shot) endocrinopathies
